title: Kyrie Irving Rebuked for Linking to Antisemitic Documentary
description: Irving, the Nets guard, posted a link on Twitter to a documentary that promotes antisemitic tropes. Joe Tsai, the Nets owner, said he was “disappointed.”
dc:creator: Shauntel Lowe
category: Hebrews to Negroes: Wake Up Black America (Movie)
media:description: Kyrie Irving is in his fourth season with the Nets.
